amendment.description: Amendment authorizes the use of funding to train school safety personnel and first responders who work at qualified educational facilities in the recognition of autism spectrum disorders.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 108-79 to authorize the use of funds to develop and improve programs to train school safety personnel and first responders who work at educational facilities in the recognition of autism.
